# PED::IS_PED_PERFORMING_MELEE_ACTION

## Summary
Whether or not the designated ped is currently performing any type of melee action (attack, block, stealth kill, takedown, dodge, etc)

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped

## Returns
* **BOOL**
